extensionName.message: URLR. - URL Shortener / Reductor of links

extensionDescription.message: Simple and powerful tool to shorten a URL / web address so that you can share it more easily to your friends or colleagues.

reduceButton.message: Reduce the URL of this page

copiedMsg.description: Message that comes after a link is reduce.

errorNotValid.message: This URL is not valid for us.
errorNotValid.description: Error message if the URL is not valid

errorTooShort.message: This URL is already very short.
errorTooShort.description: Error message if the URL is too short
